resource_explanation:
El Plano courses API(created for group by group owner).

Course attributes :

 - `title` - Represents course name(human readable identity).
 - `timestamps`

 Also, includes reference to the course lecturer.
explanation: Deletes course. NOTE : This action allowed only for group owner user.

requests.curl:
curl "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/group/courses/7" -d '' -X DELETE \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer 3016a02debc532f5373da6ce677eee51392256d329c05603659b5264c8cfe688" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
	-H "Cookie: "
